title: The Rise of the Transmigrated Movie Emperor - Novel Updates
tags: Marriage   Misunderstandings   Modern Day   Showbiz   Transmigration
author: Read Without Worries   念无忧
description:
Ming Heng had mystically transmigrated into a president-style novel he had just finished reading, and became the book’s villainous side male character. It’s only that after he had just crossed over, a divorce agreement was thrown to him by the male protagonist.

Ming Heng didn’t hesitate to sign the divorce papers. He then deleted the male protagonist’s cell phone number, WeChat and last but not the least, his Moments, Weibo posts, all the emotional entanglement and news related to the male protagonist were also deleted.

Later –

Shen Mohan: I regret it. Damn it, I must’ve been blind not to find out your kindness before.

Ming Heng: …

He Junyu: You just ought to fix it.

Yang Shuo: Yeah, yeah, yeah. Come on, come on, I’m ready!

Ming Xiao: I’m sorry, I was wrong.

Xu Chengyan: What’s wrong?

Ming Xiao: …It’s all wrong.

Xu Chengyan: …>
